document_data.name: Drakiir Street
document_data.ends: [[Way of the Dragon (Waterdeep)|Way of the Dragon]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Drakiir Street''' was a road paved in hard-packed dirt and [[gravel]],
document_data.Geography: This road ran from east to west, spanning between [[Book Street]] and the [[Way of the Dragon (Waterdeep)|Way of the Dragon]].
